release.action: The referenced bugzilla ticket and its dependencies detail the changes in this version - a summary of the more important changes are below.
combine all the different types of CEC into one
indirect parameters can be specified with the vos: VOSpace protocol.

action.p: If an application ends in the ERROR phase, a result (like an output parameter but not registered as part of the application) called cea-error reports the reasons. This result is shown in the UI.
VOSI is implemented: the service metadata and availability may be read.
If an application returns a bad status, times out, or is aborted, then no attempt is made to write back the output parameters. This should make the server logs easier to understand.
